lead_paragraph: A woman has accused the Nets’ Jason Kidd of harassing and groping her earlier this month inside a Manhattan nightclub. A spokesman for Kidd called her story a fabrication. The New York Police Department confirmed that the 23-year-old woman had filed a complaint against another clubgoer the day after the suspected incident Oct. 10 at the Tenjune club in the Meatpacking District in Manhattan. The police declined to discuss the case. The Nets said they were aware of the situation.
